component.description: IRAS90 --- IRAS Survey and PO Data Analysis Package --- Reference Guide

abstract.p: IRAS90 is a package of applications which provides facilities for the reduction and analysis of {\small IRAS} Survey and Pointed Observation (PO) data (also known as ``Additional Observation'', or ``AO'' data). It does not provide facilities for handling Low Resolution Spectrometer (LRS) data, or catalogue data.
